login.title: Login Required
login.description: You need to be logged in to benefit from this service. If you are not registered, the process takes only few minutes.
login.smartpassText: SmartPass is your digital credential to access UAE government services
login.uaepassText: UAE Pass is the National Digital Identity solution for the UAE
departmentOfEconomicDevelopment.address: Baniyas Towers, Al Falah Street, Fatima Bint Mubarak Street 6, Abu Dhabi
default.title: Start Your Business
continueProcess.title: You will be redirected shortly
continueProcess.content: Please be patient while we identify your application
goldenServices.subTitle.onStart: Apply for the Golden Services from here, by clicking on Start.
goldenServices.subTitle.serviceDescripti: This service allows you to request for specialised assistance from start to finish for all economic transactions by a customer service adviser for a fee. The customer service adviser assigned will visit you at your premise to assist you as per your convenience.
goldenServices.steps.desc.addApplication: Provide us your contact address, location, preferred date and time for the service.
goldenServices.steps.desc.makePayment: Make the necessary payment for this service.
goldenServices.steps.desc.appointmentSum: Review and confirm your appointment summary.
goldenServices.subTitle.desc.addApplicat: Please enter your contact details, location, preferred date and time for the service appointment.
goldenServices.tc.li1: The service fee for a single transaction is AED 1000
goldenServices.tc.li2: All documents required for the completion of the transaction processing shall be provided and attached in a CD or a USB before the service adviser’s visit.
goldenServices.tc.li3: The applicant shall be represented by an adviser who is fully aware of the licencing system’s legal procedures.
goldenServices.tc.li4: If the concerned adviser finds that all the required documents are not submitted while processing the transaction, the application status will be cancelled and the fees will be forfeited.
goldenServices.tc.li5: The adviser will only wait in the specified place and time for a maximum of 30 minutes to meet with the service applicant.
goldenServices.tc.li6: If the customer wishes to change the appointment time, he/she should duly notify the assigned adviser no less than 2 hours before the time of appointment.
goldenServices.label.tc: By checking this box, I agree to all the conditions above.
goldenServices.subTitle.desc.submitted: Thank you for your submission. Please be patient, you will be informed shortly on the next steps.
goldenServices.subTitle.desc.makePayment: Please find below your payment summary as per your requirements. Click Pay below to proceed with the payment.
goldenServices.subTitle.desc.paymentInPr: Please make your payment and be back here for the next steps and appointment confirmation.
goldenServices.subTitle.desc.paymentFail: Your Payment Failed. Please Try Again later.
goldenServices.subTitle.desc.paymentSucc: Your Payment Has Been Processed Successfully.
goldenServices.notice.desc.appointmentSu: Your requested appointment has been confirmed. Please be ready on the date and time specified below.
goldenServices.label.form.name: NAME*
goldenServices.validate.name.short: Name must be at least three characters long
goldenServices.validate.email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
goldenServices.validate.telephone.invali: Please enter a valid mobile number
goldenServices.validate.licenceNo.invali: Please enter a valid licence number
goldenServices.validate.address.short: Address must be at least three characters long
goldenServices.validate.time.invalid: Choose appointment time between 8:30 am - 5:30 pm
